title: Summer Internship at cHEAL
content: So as the title suggests does any of the seniors who had done the internship at cHEAL tell is that worth attending and how was your experience with the faculty and the overall 2 months there.

comments.body: Isn't this a new research centre? As far as I know this is the first summer internship batch. I don't think you'll find someone with experience there.

It's completely new like actually new , so you can try it , like seeing it you do it you gain some handson experience by the end of the project, but the mistake I did was i fucked around a lot of time so don't do that
